scenes.label: *dummy1
texts: I used my BMI to give Nonno a look at the drone launch pad we'd set up.
I checked the time and walked away from the launch pad.

scenes.label: *BMI_OFF
texts: I expanded my field of view and held my breath.
Right after it went up, I received the drone's camera feed.
This was my second time seeing it, but my eyes still weren't used to the speed. It was easily faster than a graper going at 200km/h.
But this time, thanks to the flight path data, I knew exactly where 302 was.
I adjusted the drone's trajectory with my physical keyboard, guiding it closer to the plane.
The distance between the drone and the plane closed way faster than I expected.
I hit the Enter key right before 302 disappeared from sight.
The drone went past the plane and flew off into the blue sky.

scenes.label: *visibility
texts: We used the channel and the password to enter the pilot's BMI.
Sir! They're about to break down the door!
A man who looked like the co-pilot was holding the door to the cockpit.
Keep them out! Things are only gonna get worse if the passengers get in here.
I can't hold them for much longer!
I'll try canceling the autopilot again.
This was my chance to get the code! I had to record it.
The pilot set up an AR keyboard and entered a 16-digit code.
Next, he entered the four-digit security code.
Damn it! It's still not working...!
Can we put in the code?!
Gimme a sec. I'll put the screen up.
Momo! How much time do we have?
There won't be enough time to land the plane unless you're done in two minutes!
I couldn't afford to mess up after making it this far.
I'm taking us to Haneda! Right now!
Just as planned, there were five minutes left until the plane ran out of fuel.

scenes.label: *visibility_end

timelines.label: 追加_腕c切り替えばたばたループ

timeline.timeline: 追加_腕c切り替えばたばたループ

stoptimeline.stoptimeline: 追加_腕c切り替えばたばたループ

texts: I almost went limp with relief once I got my vision back.
I froze in place. I had no idea how to react.
Momo let me go and held my hand with both of hers.
Thank you so much for saving them.
We got this future 'cause you wanted it. I just helped you get here.
You didn't have to. I know what you want.
With a smile on her face, she let go of my hand.

timelines.label: 追加_腕c切り替えばたばたループ

texts: It basically acknowledged that the situation had been dealt with.
I've never seen this before! Someone actually did it!
Hehe. Well, I knew this would happen.
Told you I was a man of my word. I meant it when I said I was gonna be the first person to complete a quest.
Now all I had to do was wait for Cicada to contact me.
I think Wind and I contributed quite a bit.
Yeah, and I mega appreciate it.
H-hold on! You're telling me that the one who completed the quest is—
We got news that the STS is working again.
I still can't believe that you're the one who did it.
What, you think anyone else could've done it?
The world's full of skilled white hats, you know?
B-but I'm the only one who completed a quest!
It felt nice to be recognized by the police—especially members of the CCO.
I'll give you my contact info. Call me anytime you need my help. I'm gonna be pretty famous now though, so I might be too busy to pick up.
Don't forget that we turned a blind eye to all those traffic lights you hacked.
Hey, I'm grateful for that. I couldn't have completed the quest without you guys.
Try to operate within the boundaries of the law, young man.
Wind sent me a MewTube LIVE link. The streamer was Wind himself.
Wind was really passionate about quests, so it was no surprise seeing him streaming his heart out.
I noticed "90110n's great achievement" was written in the description. Goddammit. He didn't even run that by me.

scenes.label: *visibility2
texts: I rushed back to the pilot's BMI.
The co-pilot was now away from the door and holding a knife.
With trembling fingers, I used my keyboard to send an alert to the pilot's vision. I sent a clip of my voice too.
The co-pilot's dangerous! Get away from him!
The man swung the knife down.
The pilot's blood fell on the floor, but since he was able to put his hand in the way, it was a relatively light wound.
The co-pilot raised the knife again and—
The passengers broke through the cockpit door.
They flooded into the cockpit itself.
Hearing the captain's distress, the passengers realized what was happening and went to restrain the co-pilot.
He was outnumbered, with nowhere to go.
He held a bible against his chest...
...and looked straight at the pilot, and the mass audience watching on MewTube.

scenes.label: *suicide
texts: The Third Prophecy of Fátima will be fulfilled. No one can stand in its way.
The co-pilot then slit his own throat, killing himself.
Momo was completely pale, and said nothing in response.
Right before it ran out of fuel, 302 landed at Haneda Airport.
